name: Prompt Reverse-Engineering System
description: Build a system that takes a screenshot of a real person, decomposes visual attributes, and outputs MJ/ComfyUI prompts to generate a similar-looking AI character. Compounds learning over iterations.

features.story: Create the master workflow doc (knowledge-base/prompt-reverse-engineering.md) with step-by-step visual decomposition framework, attribute-to-prompt mapping, MJ parameter reference, ComfyUI parameter reference, and Playwright automation notes for future autonomy
features.acceptance: File exists, covers all decomposition categories, maps to MJ syntax, includes ComfyUI params, has Playwright section

features.story: Create the iteration log (knowledge-base/prompt-iterations.md) that compounds learning - each entry: screenshot input description, prompt generated, output result, user feedback, adjustments, patterns extracted
features.acceptance: File exists with clear template, ready to accept first iteration entry

features.story: Update all project files from Egyptian/Brazilian to Japanese/Brazilian mix persona
features.acceptance: No references to Egyptian remain. Japanese/Brazilian reflected in prompts-library, content-strategy, image-gen-workflow, PROGRESS.md, operations manual

features.story: Run first iteration - user provides screenshot, Claude decomposes it using the workflow, generates MJ + ComfyUI prompts, user tests, feedback logged to iteration log
features.acceptance: First entry in prompt-iterations.md with full decomposition and generated prompts

notes: Ralph workflow: ONE task at a time
